page.title: 17WELSH MOUNTAIN FARMS-NEATH-1
page.content: My group studied the area between the{A4109}road,the{Dulais Valley}road, and the{A465,}the{Vale of Neath}road. There are several large farms on the hillsides and also on the mountain called{Hirfynydd.} The biggest farm is Lletty-r-afel and consists of{600 acres.}It specialises in the{rearing of sheep {and cattle,}but the most interesting feature is the farmhouse itself. It is between{200 and 300 years old}and is a typical{Welsh mountain farmhouse.}The farmer gets his water from a spring. It is a very quiet place. The farmer owns a mixed herd of cattle - there is a Charolais bull as well as Aberdeen Angus cows.
